Account You do not have any accounts, set one up using the button below\n\nAn account is required to save transactions as these will be used as the payment method. You could choose to make one for a "current account" or "cash" Add a virtual account to represent an account you\'d like to track your expenses for. Edit this account. Source account Destination account %1$s to %2$s Transfer from %1$s to %2$s Source and destination accounts must be different You must have at least 2 accounts to make a transfer

Transaction name cannot be blank Transaction amount cannot be blank Transaction amount is invalid Transaction amount cannot be 0 Transaction date cannot be blank Account payments do not make up the transaction amount Duplicate payment methods have been used
Please enter a name Frequency must be at least 1 Please select a frequency period Recurring end date must be after the transaction date Recurring transactions can only involve 1 payment account Transaction set to recur every %1$s Every %1$s
You do not have any recurring transactions. Set one up by adding or modifying a transaction then toggling the "recurring transaction" slider. Manage recurring transaction Frequency Unit Repeats every %1$s Next due Until Indefinitely Update the frequency settings for this recurring transaction.\n\nThe next transaction date will be based on the date of the previous transaction. Update previous transactions Would you like to update the category for all previous transactions? If not, this category will only apply to new transactions. Update recurring transaction
Account saved Could not save this account Account updated Could not update this account Category saved Could not save this category Category updated Could not update this category Transaction saved Could not save this transaction Transaction updated Could not update this transaction Recurring transaction updated Could not update this recurring transaction
Colour icon Account icon
Edit Delete Yes No No, cancel Delete account Are you sure that you want to delete this account and all associated transactions?\n\nNote: any transactions paid by multiple accounts will remain until all associated accounts are deleted Are you sure that you want to delete this account and all associated transactions?\n\nNote: any transactions paid by multiple accounts will remain until all associated accounts are deleted\n\nThis account contains recurring transactions, these will also be deleted
Delete category Are you sure that you want to delete this category and all associated transactions? Delete transaction Are you sure that you want to delete this transaction? Delete recurring transaction Are you sure that you want to delete this recurring transaction and all related transactions?
You do not have any categories, set one up using the button below\n\nA category is required to save transactions as these will be used to categorise them. You could choose to make one for "rent" or "food" Add a category that will classify one or more transactions. Edit this category. Add category Edit category Add or update a category Category icon

About Profile photo of the author Developer from the UK doing side projects such as web and Android apps. I am a Computer Science graduate from the University of Newcastle. Send me an email Go to my website Visit my GitHub
recurring_transactions_channel Recurring transactions Notifies when a transaction has been added based on current recurring transactions set. New transaction You have been paid %1$s by %2$s You have paid %1$s for %2$s
